subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
An unorthodox variant {{Han simp|陽|f=昜|t=日|nocap=y}} which can be found in various historical dictionaries such as the {{w|Kangxi dictionary}}. <!-- Refer http://dict.variants.moe.edu.tw/variants/rbt/word_attribute.rbt?quote_code=QTA0NDMyLTAwNQ#35 -->

Eventually adopted as an official simplified character by the People's Republic of China in 1956. <!-- Refer https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/漢字簡化方案 -->
